chapter.title: Overview
chapter.para: The Spring.NET Social Twitter project is an extension to Spring.NET Social that enables integration with Twitter. The Spring.NET REST Client Framework is used to consume Twitter REST API v1.1.
Twitter is a popular micro-blogging and social networking service, enabling people to communicate with each other 140 characters at a time.

Spring.NET Social Twitter supports the following .NET Frameworks :
.NET 2.0
.NET Client Profile 3.5 and 4.0
Windows Phone 7.0 and 7.1

As an extension, Spring.NET Social Twitter depends on Spring.NET Social.
Note that Spring.NET Social Twitter may release on a different schedule than Spring.NET Social. Consequently, Spring.NET Social's version may differ from that of Spring.NET Social Twitter.
